amendment.description: To appropriate $70,000,000 for grants to States, local governments, and first responders to purchase or improve communication systems to allow for real-time interoperable communication between State and local first responders and to offset this appropriation with a corresponding reduction from the Human Resources Account of the Office of the Under Secretary of Management.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3609 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 45. Record Vote Number: 172.

Amendment SA 3609 proposed by Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S9009-9013, S9014; text: CR S9009) To appropriate $70,000,000 for grants to States, local governments, and first responders to purchase or improve communication systems to allow for real-time interoperable communication between State and local first responders and to offset this appropriation with a corresponding reduction from the Human Resources Account of the Office of the Under Secretary of Management.
